content: It’s disheartening to read an announcement that a former Iowa Secretary of Ag is affiliated w/ an organization that is focused on the development of plant-based & cell-cultured ‘alternative’ protein sources.

This is the same Kamala Harris that wants the government to offer incentives & adjust dietary guidelines to reduce the consumption of red meat. 

Do you suppose alternative protein products, aka ‘fake meat,’ were served?

Source: Des Moines Register https://t.co/HNZqkVbCms
